verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lead on, O King Eternal. newline The day of march has come; newline Henceforth in fields of conquest newline Thy tents shall be our home. newline Thro' days of preparation newline Thy grace has made us strong; newline And now, O King eternal, newline We lift our battle song.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lead on, O King Eternal, newline Till sin's fierce war shall cease, newline And holiness shall whisper newline The sweet Amen of peace. newline For not with swords loud clashing, newline Nor roll of stirring drums; newline With deeds of love and mercy, newline The heav'nly kingdom comes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lead on, O King Eternal, newline We follow, not with fears; newline For gladness breaks like morning newline Where'er Thy face appears. newline Thy cross is lifted o'er us; newline We journey in its light. newline The crown awaits the conquest; newline Lead on, O God of might.
